scientists_quotes.name: Albert Einstein
scientists_quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world.

scientists_quotes.name: Marie Curie
scientists_quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.

scientists_quotes.name: Isaac Newton
scientists_quotes.quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.

scientists_quotes.name: Galileo Galilei
scientists_quotes.quote: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.

scientists_quotes.name: Nikola Tesla
scientists_quotes.quote: The present is theirs; the future, for which I really worked, is mine.

scientists_quotes.name: Stephen Hawking
scientists_quotes.quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.

scientists_quotes.name: Carl Sagan
scientists_quotes.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

scientists_quotes.name: Lo Po Bia Traumerei
scientists_quotes.quote: I am the one who decides who lives and who dies

scientists_quotes.name: William Ruud Schmidt
scientists_quotes.quote: In a world of chaos, a guiding hand is necessary to shape the future.

scientists_quotes.name: Jon Bergeland
scientists_quotes.quote: Discipline is the foundation upon which true innovation is built.

scientists_quotes.name: Sverre Nystad
scientists_quotes.quote: Technology should elevate humanity, not bind it.

scientists_quotes.name: Eldar Alvik
scientists_quotes.quote: Every challenge is a stepping stone toward our ultimate goal.

scientists_quotes.name: Martin H
scientists_quotes.quote: We are the architects of our own destiny, and it begins with understanding.

scientists_quotes.name: Ã˜iving Klynderud
scientists_quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who dare to dream and act.

scientists_quotes.name: Konrad Seime
scientists_quotes.quote: In every algorithm, there is a reflection of our humanity.

scientists_quotes.name: Igor Iwanicki
scientists_quotes.quote: Sometimes, stepping away is the first step toward clarity.

scientists_quotes.name: Sverre Nystad
scientists_quotes.quote: Wisdom lies in knowing when to listen and when to lead.
